column4: Yes, the original install settings, as they were when I installed Ubuntu. I had trouble with a LAN at the house of someone who knows Windows networking, he tried to fix it, it turned out to be a physical problem with the cable, but my laptop has had many network problems since.
this on my laptop - right now i'm on my desktop and the laptop is behind me.
Just say no to Windows l00sers touching your precious :P
have you considered booting off the livecd and taking some screenshots of the network configuration? :)
